keyMoments.title: Vergo Arrives at Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Vergo arrives at the Punk Hazard facility, with the G-5 Marines initially celebrating their beloved base commander's arrival.
keyMoments.significance: First physical appearance of Vergo in the anime, setting up his role as a major antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Vergo's Betrayal Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vergo shocks everyone by brutally attacking the G-5 Marines and revealing his allegiance to Doflamingo.
keyMoments.significance: Major plot twist establishing Vergo as a traitor and revealing the corruption within the Marines.
keyMoments.quote: They will all be killed here, and I will pass off their deaths as an accident.

keyMoments.title: Vergo Uses Shigan
keyMoments.description: Vergo demonstrates his mastery of Rokushiki techniques by using Shigan to attack multiple G-5 Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Vergo's advanced combat abilities and establishes him as a formidable physical threat.

keyMoments.title: Vergo Brutally Attacks Tashigi
keyMoments.description: Vergo delivers a devastating punch to Tashigi, severely injuring her.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Vergo's ruthless nature and willingness to harm his former subordinates.

abilities.description: Finger Gun technique that allows the user to pierce targets with their finger.

relationships.description: Vergo works undercover in the Marines as a subordinate and loyal follower of Doflamingo.

evolutionMoments.description: Vergo's allegiance to Doflamingo (Joker) is revealed.

relationships.description: Vergo was Tashigi's superior officer at the G-5 Marine base before his betrayal.

evolutionMoments.description: Vergo attacks Tashigi, revealing he never cared for his subordinates.

reveals.information: Vergo is a Marine Vice Admiral working undercover for Doflamingo
Master of Rokushiki techniques including Shigan
Member of the Donquixote Pirates serving as an undercover agent

keyMoments.title: Tashigi's Memories of Vergo
keyMoments.description: Tashigi recalls her memories of Vergo at G-5, including his frequent claims about visiting a sick sister.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the depth of Vergo's deception and how long he's been lying to his subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Confronts Vergo
keyMoments.description: Despite being outmatched, Tashigi courageously charges at Vergo to protect the G-5 Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Tashigi's bravery and sense of justice.
keyMoments.quote: Run! Everyone get away from here!

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Severely Injured by Vergo
keyMoments.description: Tashigi is brutally defeated by Vergo with a devastating punch.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the vast power difference and necessitates Sanji's rescue.

relationships.description: Tashigi served under Vice Admiral Vergo at the G-5 base.

evolutionMoments.description: Learns of Vergo's betrayal and is attacked by him.
Sanji comes to Tashigi's rescue after hearing her tears.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Hears Tashigi's Tears
keyMoments.description: Sanji arrives to rescue Tashigi, claiming he heard her tears falling.
keyMoments.significance: Iconic moment showcasing Sanji's chivalrous nature and protective instincts.
keyMoments.quote: I heard a lady's tears falling.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Kicks Vergo
keyMoments.description: Sanji delivers a powerful flaming Diable Jambe kick to Vergo's face.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the confrontation between Sanji and the traitorous Vice Admiral.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji comes to Tashigi's aid after hearing her tears.

relationships.description: Sanji confronts Vergo to protect Tashigi.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Helps Mocha
keyMoments.description: Chopper finds Mocha hallucinating and administers a sedative to calm her down.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's medical care and Mocha's vulnerable state due to Caesar's drugs.

keyMoments.title: Mocha Asked to Help Children
keyMoments.description: Chopper pleads with Mocha to help prevent the other children from eating the drugged candy.
keyMoments.significance: Enlists Mocha as an ally in saving the children from Caesar's experiments.

relationships.description: Chopper helps Mocha and asks for her assistance in saving the other children.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper treats Mocha and enlists her help.
